reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a classic with great quality, appreciating its perfect weight for transitioning into fall and its fantastic length, particularly noting it's long enough for tall women.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winner of long, maxi, ‚Äúflowy,‚Äù open front, lightweight, cardigan category. Trust me
items.body: Finally! Have found the maxi length lightweight cardigan (not a sweater) that hangs as it was intended and advertised. Let me save you a LOT of time and effort (buying, returning, buying another brand, returning, etc). I have tried every one of them. I have purchased so much and had to deal with so many returns because the fabric was wrong, or it did not hang properly towards the bottom of the garment. Most of them show hanging in front of the shin but they only hang down the side of the legs making it look kind of weird. This one may be a few bucks more but you get what you pay for and the style you are looking for. I am 5‚Äô2‚Äù and, while barefoot, this size L hangs about 4‚Äù from the floor, is consistent from front to back, is very sturdy soft fabric, not so thin you can see straight through it, and drapes/hangs and flows beautifully when walking. Not too much so, that it makes you look like you are taking flight, either. Just enough, just right. I have spent 3 weeks ordering, trying, re-ordering, re-trying, returning, returning, returning, all lengths, fabrics, colors, and available cardigans. I do have favorite tested brands at this point. Bluetime is the hands down winner in the long maxi category. I am now comparing my last two candidates on the longer open front sweater style straight cardigans, though still lightweight. I have narrowed it down to Anymiss and Grace Karin. I will receive my first Grace Karin today and believe the fabric will be softer than the exact same style sweater/cardigan from Anymiss. (As we all know, it is all in fabric!!!) I will update as soon as I check it out and let you know. One of these brands will be going back and the other will be the hands down winner in the longer, straight , open front cardigan, lightweight sweater category. I‚Äôm not sure if I should have mentioned these brands on this Bluetime review, but I haven‚Äôt seen a Bluetime sweater style cardigan like the one I am talking about, so‚Ä¶.. just FYI HAPPY SHOPPING Read more
items.author: Cheryl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering but some issues, still recommend
items.body: I do recommend this product even though there are issues. First the good: I initially purchased it in the black color. I wore it to a funeral with more casual black pants and a black t-shirt but with a fancy scarf and this sweater made it look much more formal and you couldn't tell at all about how casual my pants and shirt were that I desperately needed for being comfortable. I wear it with everything and it pulls an outfit together (even my pj bottoms with a t-shirt look stylish with this over them). It's flattering the way it falls. It's very "flowy" and it has pockets, which I appreciate. It's comfortable because it's lightweight and stretchy. I've been able to wear it in both Fall and Winter so far in California weather and have been both cool enough and warm enough. The fabric seems breathable and doesn't accumulate odors. It seems true to size and covers well. Lengthwise, I'm 5'7" and it falls to about 4" above my ankles so someone significantly shorter may need to hem it or wear heels. The sleeves are long enough to cover 1/2 of my hand if I want to wear them that long but they also pull up really easily or fold over without ruining the look. I think it would look good with a wide belt too. It also washes well. These are very comfortable and flattering, make it very easy to throw an outfit together that looks pulled together and it works for both casual and formal in my opinion, so for those reasons I recommend it. The issues: because it's flowy, it catches on anything I walk by & the way the thread was sewn at the bottom allows it to pull like a purse string. I just pull it back into shape and figure that I can run a stitch in the bottom that won't cause it to gather when caught should it become aggravating enough. My husband has also stepped on it when going down the stairs behind me & it‚Äôs easy to close the car door on it so you always have to make sure it‚Äôs all the way in the vehicle. Another issue is that it does pill very quickly, but it still looks decent enough that I don't care. I think because the material is thin that it isn't as noticeable. If you hold it up to the light, it's quite sheer, but when wearing it, it looks solid. It does wrinkle, but the fabric has weight to it so it generally seems to pull the wrinkles out where it isn't an issue for me. Another issue is that the colors are not represented well online. I suppose there may be variation in what people receive, but some of the colors online are different (both on my computer and phone) than what I received. The red is a much lighter orangey red, not a blue red, contrary to what some other reviews have said, at least the one I received. The gray blue is lighter and almost a teal but I especially like that one. The green is also lighter, like a kelly green, not a pine green, which I would have preferred, but they're good enough that I'm keeping them and figure I can try dyeing them darker if I feel compelled. I had a couple of issues with the orders but that has nothing to do with the actual product. I did receive a used one that was damaged and dirty that I had to return and when I ordered the red one, it had a much longer shipping time and then disappeared from my order list. When I contacted Amazon, they said the order was cancelled (no documentation or explanation whatsoever and none about being refunded as they said). I re-ordered it and (again) it took longer but did get here in less than a week, unlike the initial order of the red one that was going to take around 10 days. I recommend this for the comfort, flattering silhouette, and how easy it is to look pulled together, but if you have higher standards than I do, the pilling, wrinkles, and bottom hem when caught on something my be unacceptable to you. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Got it in every color!
items.body: Lightweight. Floor length but doesn‚Äôt drag on the floor (and I‚Äôm 5‚Äô1). The material is delicate. If you clip something on it then holes can easily be made. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight
items.body: Light weight, yet it kept me warm. Not toasty warm, but warm. It looked good too. üôÇ fits me well Read more
items.author: Kim D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for tall gals! Even the arm length is good!
items.body: Love the TEAL BLUE color - it's just like the "kingfisher" color in my True Autumn Color Analysis - a star color for me. :) 5'10" tall, 135-140#, I ordered a Large. What I like: the color, the duster length (great for Kibbe FNs), the arm length is great, and the fabric is soft, light, a bit flowy, comfortable, and a good price, too! Read more
items.author: ga

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars I didn't like the style
items.body: The material doesn't look like the picture of what the model is wearing, the material is too thin and wrinkled you will have to take it to the cleaners before you can wear it. I didn't like the style Read more
items.author: Pattycake

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Know what you‚Äôre getting
items.body: Very thin material. Think tshirt. Length is good. Especially for us tall girlies. Soft to the touch. Wrinkles easily. Read more
items.author: The Professional

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs very big
items.body: This sweater is so nice and feels just tge right weight. Im returning for a smaller size. It runs very very big. I got my usual XXL and suspect I will go down two sizes for it to not be so drapey Read more
items.author: Karen Barrows

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nutmeg, Olive Green, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Light Apricot, Dusty Pink, Black, Orange, Rose Red, Royal Blue, Light Brown, Mocha Mousse, Sage Green, Teal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
